id: US military plane accidentally drops Humvee 7 miles from base
paragraph: By Zachary Cohen and Ryan Browne, CNNUpdated 9:46 PM ET, Wed October 24, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.Washington (CNN)A US military C-17 transport plane accidentally dropped a Humvee vehicle into a wooded rural area outside of Fort Bragg, North Carolina Wednesday during testing, landing more than seven miles north of the intended drop zone.
